item.title: Scientists Just Figured Out How Coffee May Slow Aging
item.description: Evidence is mounting that coffee slows aging and helps you stay healthy. Scientists are starting to figure out exactly why.

item.title: A Collab Among Competitors? Why Amazon Is Partnering With SpaceX on Satellite Launches
item.description: An unlikely collaboration between Amazon and SpaceX shows that practicality can trump rivalry when it comes to the space race.

item.title: Investors Don’t Want Trump to Fire Jerome Powell
item.description: Rumors of President Trump firing the Fed Chair sent markets whipsawing.

item.title: AI Enables Everyone to be an Instant Expert—Is That Good?
item.description: AI can make anyone sound like an expert, even when they lack the one-level-below understanding that defines authentic expertise.

item.title: 4 Signs to Quickly Identify Someone With Exceptional Leadership Skills
item.description: Managers who create a positive employee experience have the edge.
